section.name: Example getProxyTicket Java/Axis Code
section.p: In this example the Moria2-enabled service, having earlier aquired a ticket granting ticket (tgt attribute; here hardcoded to be MDA3AAABAVvsT52YvxxKM3yKATVbQtD*sREX80W7cUNXLIvPtvgIYrUc7IjNp9fXQkFpR3fRqkDi0T4), requests a proxy ticket for a subservice identified in Moria2's configuration as subservice_username.
The SOAP implementation used in this example is Axis.
The above code assumes that Moria2 is deployed locally. The proxy ticket proxyTicket may now be passed on to the subservice subservice_username.
